caption: This photograph features a silhouette of a windmill set against a vivid, deep red-orange backdrop. The blades have a slight curvature and geometric spacing that captures and intricately disperses the backlight of the sun, thus enhancing the visual prominence of the windmill against the relatively darker surrounding scenery. title: Sunset behind windmill
